Module AM08
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class PlayerState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.PlayerState
public class PlayerState extends Object
this class represents a generic player of the match

    equals(Object obj)
    This method overrides the method equals. it assumes that two players are equals if they have the same attributes (the same Shelf, the same firstPoint ...); if the object passed by parameter isn't a PlayerState, return false

      public boolean isCGDone(int index)
      This method returns if a commonGoal is done or not

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      This method overrides the method equals. it assumes that two players are equals if they have the same attributes (the same Shelf, the same firstPoint ...); if the object passed by parameter isn't a PlayerState, return false

      equals in class Object
      Parameters:

      true if the player are equals
